groupId.description: Indicates the Staging.CivilProsecutor assigned group id for bulk cases

isCivil.description: Marker to indicate that MoJ offence reference data should be used as opposed to criminal offence reference data

isGroupMember.description: Indicates if a case is part of a group of cases within the hearing

isGroupMaster.description: Indicates which case within a group (isGroupMember = true) is the master and should be returned by the backend to the UI
